animal.question: I say 'Meow!' and love to play with yarn. What am I?

hints.text: 🐈‍⬛ I purr when you pet me.

animal.question: I waddle and say 'Quack!'. I like to swim in a pond. What am I?
I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like playing in the yard.

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat grass in the field.
🥛 I give you milk with your cookies.
🐄 I am a large farm animal.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I can use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. I love to eat carrots. What am I?
I roar and I'm the king of the jungle. What am I?
I have black and white stripes. What am I?
I hiss and slither on the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I like to bask in the sun.

animal.question: I have a pouch and hop around. What am I?

hints.text: 👶 I carry my baby in my pouch.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Rabbits like to munch on me.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and sometimes pretty colors. People like to give me as a gift. What am I?
I am big and tall, with a trunk and branches. Birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍁 I can lose my leaves in the fall.

plant.question: I am small and green, and cover the ground like a soft blanket. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I'm short and grow close to the earth.

plant.question: I grow on a vine, and you can eat me. I'm sometimes green, red, or purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🥤 You can make juice from me.
🌞 I need lots of sun to grow.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when I am heated up. You can eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I am fluffy and white when cooked.
🌽 I start as a small, hard kernel.
🎬 People enjoy eating me while watching movies.

plant.question: I have prickly stems and beautiful flowers, and I am a symbol of love. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am a popular gift on Valentine's Day.
💐 I come in many colors, like red, pink, and white.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that grows underground, and I can be mashed, baked, or fried. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You can make french fries with me!
🥔 I have a brown or reddish skin.
🥣 I can be served with butter and sour cream.

plant.question: I am a tall plant that grows in a field, and you can eat me from the cob, or I can be turned into a sweet syrup. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 Animals like to eat me too!

plant.question: I am a fruit that grows on a tree. I am round and juicy and come in many colors, like red, green and yellow. I'm known to keep the doctor away. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White ate one that made her sleepy.
🥧 You can make a yummy pie with me.
☀️ I grow best in the autumn.
